name: Monitor
description:
Monitor is a "game jam" made in under 48 hours, that explores what happens when the monotonous world of security meets robots.

Note: This can be played in the browser, however the best experience is definitely the downloaded version, however this only supports Windows. In the browser expect some funky lighting and audio issues.

Created by Joshua Coombes-Hall.

Music by Kelton Hallo.
If you want any music work done by Kelton, shoot him an email at keltonhallomusic@gmail.com. (He is amazing)
